STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Immerse yourself in cutting-edge graphics and revolutionary gameplay
LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing the future of gaming: Coming this holiday season
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Immerse yourself in stunning graphics, lightning-fast performance, and an expansive library of exclusive titles. The next generation of gaming starts here.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Experience gaming like never before with our cutting-edge graphics technology, delivering hyper-realistic visuals and smooth frame rates.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Say goodbye to loading screens with our revolutionary SSD and advanced processing power, allowing for seamless gameplay and instant game switches.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Dive into your games with our 3D audio technology, providing pinpoint sound accuracy and a truly immersive auditory experience.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Take control with our ergonomic, feature-packed controller, complete with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for unparalleled immersion.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Access a vast collection of exclusive titles and popular multi-platform games, with new releases and updates delivered regularly.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Connect with friends, stream content, and access cloud gaming with our robust online infrastructure and user-friendly interface.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Immerse yourself in breathtaking worlds with unparalleled graphics and lightning-fast performance
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions about our revolutionary game console? We're here to help!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What sets this console apart from others?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our console features cutting-edge graphics, lightning-fast load times, and exclusive game titles that you won't find anywhere else. It's designed to provide an immersive gaming experience that pushes the boundaries of what's possible in home entertainment.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: When will the console be available for purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The console is scheduled for release in the upcoming holiday season. Pre-orders will be available starting next month through our website and select retail partners. Stay tuned for exact dates and pricing information.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What games will be available at launch?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We're excited to offer a diverse lineup of launch titles, including highly anticipated sequels, brand new IPs, and remastered classics. Our launch library will cater to all types of gamers, from casual players to hardcore enthusiasts.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, our new console is designed with backwards compatibility in mind. It will be able to play a vast majority of games from our previous console generation, ensuring that your favorite titles aren't left behind when you upgrade.
CTA_BODY: Immerse yourself in stunning graphics, lightning-fast performance, and a vast library of cutting-edge games. Our revolutionary console redefines entertainment.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: Unleash the Future of Gaming Today
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our revolutionary new game console
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What makes this game console unique?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our console features cutting-edge graphics technology, seamless cloud gaming integration, and exclusive titles you won't find anywhere else.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: When will the console be available for purchase?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The console is set to launch worldwide on November 15th this year. Pre-orders will be available starting next month.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: What games will be available at launch?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We're excited to offer 20 launch titles, including highly anticipated sequels and brand new IPs. A full list will be revealed closer to the release date.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, our new console is fully backwards compatible with games from our previous two generations, ensuring you can enjoy your favorite classics.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: What are the console's technical specifications?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: The console boasts a custom 8-core CPU, 16GB of GDDR6 RAM, and a 1TB SSD for lightning-fast load times. It supports 4K gaming at 60fps, with select titles supporting up to 120fps.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Experience gaming like never before with cutting-edge graphics and lightning-fast processing power.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Dive into a vast collection of exclusive titles and beloved franchises, all optimized for unparalleled gameplay.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Connect with players worldwide through seamless online multiplayer and innovative social features.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 NexGen Gaming. All rights reserved. Experience the future of gaming with NexGen Console. For support, contact us at support@nexgenconsole.com
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Stay Ahead of the Game: Subscribe for Exclusive Console Updates
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear from the early adopters who've experienced the future of gaming
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This console has completely revolutionized my gaming experience. The graphics are mind-blowing, and the load times are practically non-existent!
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I've owned every major console, but this one takes the cake. The exclusive titles and seamless online play have made me fall in love with gaming all over again.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The backward compatibility and cross-platform features are game-changers. It's not just a console, it's the centerpiece of my entertainment setup.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_2: Console, two controllers, and three games
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_3: Console, four controllers, five games, and accessories
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: High-quality gaming headset with surround sound
SIDEBAR_BOTTOM_SUBTEXT_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Unleash the power of cutting-edge technology
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Immerse yourself in cutting-edge graphics, lightning-fast performance, and an expansive library of exclusive titles.
